name: InfluenzaTestsForInfluenzaBVirusNucleicAcid
title: Influenza (Tests for influenza B virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect nucleic acids of Influenza B virus),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: influenza B),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
